name: WEEK
shortDescription: Extract week of year from date
description: Returns the ISO week number (1-53) for a date.

examples.title: Get week number
examples.sql: SELECT WEEK(order_date) as week_num FROM orders

examples.title: Group by week
examples.sql:
SELECT YEAR(date) as year, WEEK(date) as week, SUM(amount) as total
FROM sales
GROUP BY YEAR(date), WEEK(date)

notes: Week 1 is the first week with at least 4 days
